articles.title: California declares a state of emergency over monkeypox outbreak, following New York and Illinois
articles.description: California's declaration comes after Illinois declared a public health emergency earlier Monday. New York declared a state disaster emergency late Friday.
articles.content:
California Gov. Gavin Newsom declared a state of emergency over the rapidly spreading monkeypox outbreak on Monday, the third U.S. state to do so in a matter of days.

articles.author: Noah Berger
articles.title: 2 bodies found in burned vehicle in California wildfire zone
articles.description: YREKA, Calif. (AP) — Two bodies were found inside a charred vehicle in a driveway in the wildfire zone of a raging California blaze that was among several menacing thousands of homes Monday in the Western U.S., officials said.

articles.title: U.S. Warns China Not to Turn Pelosi’s Expected Trip to Taiwan Into a ‘Crisis’
articles.description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi, a longtime China hawk, has not confirmed that she plans to visit Taiwan, but all indications suggest that she will make a stop on the self-governing island without prior announcement.

articles.title: Inmate in Oklahoma kills officer at privately run prison

articles.title: Jan 6. rioter who carried gun to US Capitol and threatened Nancy Pelosi gets more than 7 years in prison
articles.description: A federal judge on Monday sentenced Guy Reffitt, who brought a gun to the US Capitol during the January 6, 2021, riot and threatened House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, to more than seven years in prison, the longest insurrection-related sentence to date.

articles.title: Wealthy dentist found guilty of murdering wife on African safari trip
articles.description: Lawrence Rudolph, a rich dentist accused of murdering his wife of 34 years on a hunting trip in Zambia, was found guilty in Denver federal court on Monday.
